task.title: Set Up a Localhost Server
task.shortdesc: How to get a localhost server up and running on a mac.

taskbody.context: This only works for macs and has only been tested on OSX 10.9.3.

step.cmd: Enter the following command to start the server:
You will have to enter your computer administrator password.
Navigate to http://localhost/ and you should see "It works!"
To add a BWH website to your local server, you need to create a folder to contain the files: (You can name the folder whatever you want. I am using "bwh" for this example.)
And you must change the permissions so that the DITA OT can write to it:
Then, when using the DITA OT to build your BWH website, specify the outdir to be /Library/WebServer/Documents/bwh.
Alternatively, you can copy a pre-built project into /Library/WebServer/Documents.

taskbody.result: To view your website, navigate to http://localhost/bwh.
